title: Dog gets her owner laughing by pulling a ridiculous tongue-drooping smile
text:
A dog was caught on camera entertaining its owner with an unusual smile.

The footage of the 11-year-old dog called Tiny was recorded in Devon earlier this month.

In the video, Tiny's owner walks through the house before rounding the corner to find his pet pooch sitting patiently on the sofa.

He stands next to her and repeatedly says 'hello! hello, darling!' to the adorable dog who wiggles her tail in excitement.

She then sticks her tongue out and bares her teeth, much to the delight of her owner.

He goes on to say: 'Look at your smile, Tiny. You're so funny aren't you!

'You are such a lovely girl.'

The footage of the 11-year-old dog called Tiny was recorded by her owner in Devon earlier this month

Tiny's owner walks through the house before rounding the corner to find his pet pooch sitting patiently on the sofa and she greets him by sticking out her tongue and baring her teeth

He strokes her affectionately as the dog then puts her tongue away but continues to flash her gnashes.

Tiny continues to lap up the attention and even lets out a small bark of appreciation.

The video ends shortly after.

Tiny's owner said: 'She started smiling a few years ago and her smiles have just become bigger and bigger.

'This is possibly the best smile she has done so far.'
